headline: Berkshire Hathaway's Q1 13F Filing Reveals Buffett's Thinking About Bank of America And Apple
summary: Buffett holds steady with Apple, now 26% of Berkshire's portfolio, while trimming Bank of America, signaling cautious views on banking stocks. See more on BRK.A here.
